content: *pizzazz - a quality or style that is exciting or interesting * this 12 afghan square certainly will hold your interest with several variants of shell stitches at least three colors of worsted weight yarn are recommended to achieve optimum beauty your own creativity and unique color selections will produce a quality piece that exudes pizzazz come join me at my ravelry group - melinda miller designs 1 - where we test new patterns participate in cal s and just have some good crochet fun 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/melinda-miller-designs
